MTseeker 0.9.47
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

MAlignments-class

wraps a GAlignments with information about coverage and its target BAM file

coverage(<MAlignments>) runLength(<MAlignments>) runValue(<MAlignments>) Summary(<MAlignments>) show(<MAlignments>) fileName(<MAlignments>) scanBamHeader(<MAlignments>)

MAlignments methods (centralized).

MAlignments()

wrap a GAlignments for easier stats

MAlignmentsList-class

wraps a GAlignmentsList (made up of MAlignments) for nicer viewing

coverage(<MAlignmentsList>) runLength(<MAlignmentsList>) fileName(<MAlignmentsList>) Summary(<MAlignmentsList>) show(<MAlignmentsList>)

MAlignmentsList methods (centralized).

MAlignmentsList()

wrap a GAlignmentsList for viewing

MVRanges-class

like a VRanges, but for mitochondria

coverage(<MVRanges>) type(<MVRanges>) genes(<MVRanges>) snpCall(<MVRanges>) pos(<MVRanges>) show(<MVRanges>) annotation(<MVRanges>) getAnnotations(<MVRanges>) encoding(<MVRanges>) filt(<MVRanges>) genome(<MVRanges>) locateVariants(<MVRanges>,<missing>,<missing>) tallyVariants(<MVRanges>) predictCoding(<MVRanges>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) summarizeVariants(<MVRanges>,<missing>,<missing>) plot(<MVRanges>,<ANY>)

MVRanges methods (centralized).

MVRanges()

wrap a VRanges for mitochondrial use

MVRangesList-class

like a VRangesList, but for mitochondria

coverage(<MVRangesList>) `counts<-`(<MVRangesList>,<RangedSummarizedExperiment>) counts(<MVRangesList>) genes(<MVRangesList>) snpCall(<MVRangesList>) getAnnotations(<MVRangesList>) encoding(<MVRangesList>) predictCoding(<MVRangesList>,<missing>,<missing>,<missing>) show(<MVRangesList>) filt(<MVRangesList>) granges(<MVRangesList>) summarizeVariants(<MVRangesList>,<missing>,<missing>) genome(<MVRangesList>) locateVariants(<MVRangesList>,<missing>,<missing>) tallyVariants(<MVRangesList>) plot(<MVRangesList>,<ANY>)

MVRangesList methods (centralized).

MVRangesList()

wrap a VRangesList for mitochondrial use

addMtGeneLabel()

Set gene names for bp ranges. Original code by Stephen Turner at UVA.

byStrand()

simple helper function to split a *RangesList by the strand of its mt target

callMT() callMtVars()

call mitochondrial variants against rCRS from an MAlignments[List] object

callTNMT() callTnMtVars()

call mitochondrial tumor/normal variants from an MAlignments[List] object

filterMT()

Filter SummarizedExperiment or DataFrame values based on its $mtCovg column

fixMetadata()

fix metadata for an MAlignmentsList or MVRangesList, if needed and possible.

getMT()

grab the mitochondrial reads from a BAM and estimate their fraction

indexMtGenome()

build and install GmapGenome.[organism].[mtGenome], mostly for rCRS

injectMtVariants()

Inject (one or more) variants against rCRS.

mtCircos()

plot a canonical human (or, in principle, any) mitochondrial genome

mtComplex()

plot the (putative) functional impact of mutations to ETP genes as SVG

mtCoverage()

mitochondrial genome coverage for an MAlignments or MVRanges object

mtHGVS()

convert mitochondrial variant calls to HGVS format for naming

plotMT()

plot mitochondrial variant calls in the context of heteroplasmy

s4Methods()

List all defined methods for an S4 class (or classes, if you must)

validMetadata()

Ensure that the metadata caches in MAlignmentsLists and MVRangesLists are OK

Contents

  • All functions

Developed by Tim Triche, Ben Johnson, Noor Sohail.
